category.name: Development
category.description: Here you can see which developers we are looking for

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion, PixelPlex is looking for a Middle React Frontend Developer in London.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• Front-end development of cryptocurrency wallets and block explorers, as well as other apps communicating with the blockchain
  • Working in a team of 3-6 people according to development methodologies (Scrum or Waterfall)
  • Application architecture design
  • Maintaining technical documentation

content.title: REQUIREMENTS
content.list:
• 1+ year of experience in web app development
  • Frontend: React.js, Redux, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js
  • Knowledge of HTML, CSS

content.title: WE OFFER
content.list:
• Competitive salary
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Opportunities for professional growth and implementation of your ideas
  • Interesting projects in different spheres
  • Up to 100% compensation of gym/sport membership
  • Medical insurance
  • Rich corporate culture

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion, PixelPlex is looking for a Business Development Manager for the London office.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• Establishing contact with business owners
  • Giving presentations on the company’s services
  • Conducting business negotiations
  • Finding strategic partners for the company’s products
  • Analyzing and creating technical specifications
  • Concluding profitable contracts
  • Ensuring effective management of workflows
  • Searching for potential clients and building rapport with them
  • Designing viable sales, service & product development strategies
  • Conducting market research
  • Building a strong customer base and partnerships
  • Generating new ideas

content.title: REQUIREMENTS
content.list:
• Relevant experience in the IT sphere (at least 2 years)
  • Experience of active and effective participation in promoting an IT product (outsourcing direction)
  • University degree (knowledge/degree in the technical area would be a plus)
  • Experience working and interacting with IT specialists of various levels
  • Well-developed business correspondence skills
  • Ability and readiness to demonstrate good results
  • High level of self-organization
  • Ability to analyze, structure, and present information in an understandable way

content.title: PERSON SPECIFICATION
content.list:
• Great communication and negotiation skills
  • Good written and spoken language
  • Commitment, proactivity, resilience, positive thinking
  • Ability to quickly and efficiently complete assigned tasks
  • Analytical thinking, ability to handle multiple tasks, craving for professional development

category.name: Development
category.description: Here you can see which developers we are looking for

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion PixelPlex is looking for a Rust Developer.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• Developing projects in Rust
  • Participation in the design of the architecture of applications
  • Test writing
  • Support of completed projects
  • Maintenance of project technical documentation

content.title: REQUIREMENTS
content.list:
• Experience with Rust 2018
  • Experience with STD, no_std
  • Knowledge and application of SOLID principles and TDD techniques
  • Experience with Linux OS
  • Understanding why Docker is needed
  • Experience with version control systems (Git)
  • Ability to write simple and clear code
  • Knowledge of design principles and patterns

content.title: NICE TO HAVE
content.list:
• Experience with C++ and Go
  • Experience with p2p networks
  • Experience writing scripts in Bash
  • Experience with Blockchain
  • General knowledge of cryptography

category.name: Development
category.description: Here you can see which developers we are looking for

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion PixelPlex is looking for a Senior Data Scientist.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• Identifying business challenges
  • Using machine learning / deep learning methodologies to address business challenges
  • Presenting the findings in a clear and informative way
  • Working in a team and creating solutions to real-life problems
  • Mentoring junior and middle-level specialists

content.title: REQUIREMENTS
content.list:
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Data focused applied mathematics (statistical analysis, machine learning)
  • Understanding of Machine Learning / Deep Learning methodologies, math and tricks
  • Understanding of data structures and algorithms
  • RDBMS knowledge
  • Programming experience: Python and C++ preferred
  • Experience in production of Data Science projects (3+ years)
  • Data visualization skills
  • Advanced Linux user
  • Familiarity with version control systems (Git, etc.)
  • Good communication skills and ability to convey complex ideas in a concise manner

content.title: NICE TO HAVE
content.list:
• Degree in Computer Science or related field
  • Experience in Python back-end development
  • Experience with machine learning cloud platforms
  • Experience in distributed systems development (distributed neural networks training)
  • Experience with Docker

en.description: PixelPlex is currently looking for a talented, creative and experienced Technical Copywriter.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• Creating marketing materials, sales presentations, website landing pages, blog articles, news posts, technical documentation, etc.
  • Conducting research and gathering required information from coworkers
  • Work in close collaboration with technical experts
  • Proofreading and editing existing pieces of work

content.title: MUST HAVE
content.list:
• 2+ years of work experience as a copywriter in IT
  • Fluent written English
  • Strong communication skills
  • Ability and desire to learn new information and grow professionally
  • Ability to multitask and handle multiple deadlines

content.title: WOULD BE AN ADVANTAGE
content.list:
• Technical background;
  • Knowledge of blockchain technology and its recent trends;
  • Understanding of copywriting best practices, SEO principles, keyword placement, etc.

category.name: Development
category.description: Here you can see which developers we are looking for

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion PixelPlex is looking for an Android Developer.

content.title: REQUIREMENTS
content.list:
• Experience in an Android Developer position at least 3 years
  • Knowledge of Kotlin and Java
  • Experience with GooglePlay Services, Architecture Components, Jetpack, Coroutines
  • Knowledge of OOP principles and design patterns
  • Knowledge of TDD, MVVM, MVP, SOLID, CI, DI, Clean Architecture
  • Knowledge of the basics of Computer Science
  • Availability of completed projects in portfolio

content.title: NICE TO HAVE
content.list:
• Experience developing client-server applications with data caching
  • Experience in working on a large project
  • Technical English
  • Flutter

category.name: Development
category.description: Here you can see which developers we are looking for

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion PixelPlex is looking for a Lead iOS Developer.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• iOS integration with blockchain
  • Developing new module functionality
  • Revise code and optimize application performance
  • Participate in the release process
  • Decide on the architecture and technology of apps

content.title: REQUIREMENTS
content.list:
• 3+ years of iOS development experience
  • Objective-C, Swift, iOS SDK, Xcode proficiency
  • Proficiency in OOP principles and design patterns
  • Client-server application & data caching development experience
  • Experience in TDD, VIPER, MVP, SOLID, CI
  • Portfolio of fully developed projects
  • Strong development culture: testing, code review, CI / CD, etc

content.title: NICE TO HAVE
content.list:
• Experience working on large projects
  • Experience dealing with blockchain
  • Experience in IoT
  • Basic knowledge of cryptography

en.description: Due to the company’s expansion PixelPlex is looking for a talented, highly motivated and experienced Sales Department Lead.

content.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
content.list:
• Active B2B sales to clients all over the world (mainly US and Europe)
  • Developing the existing customer base and managing client relationships
  • Participating in marketing and sales events
  • Sales team management IT company sales optimization (outsourcing)
  • Development of sales
  • Managing communications with key clients
  • Reporting to Head of Business Development

content.title: MUST HAVE
content.list:
• 4.5+ years of work experience as a sales manager in IT
  • Fluent spoken and written English
  • Experience of mentoring
  • Work experience with native English-speaking clients
  • Strong communication and goal-driven attitude
  • Ability and desire to learn new information and grow professionally
  • Ability to multitask and handle multiple deadlines
